com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.context

Interface DriverContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AttachmentPoint

    public interface DriverContext
extends AttachmentPoint
    Holds common components that are shared throughout a driver instance.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.detach.AttachmentPoint

    • Method Detail

      • getSessionName

        @NonNull
String getSessionName()
        This is the same as Session.getName(), it's exposed here for components that only have a reference to the context.

      • getConfig

        @NonNull
DriverConfig getConfig()
        Returns:
        The driver's configuration; never null.

      • getConfigLoader

        @NonNull
DriverConfigLoader getConfigLoader()
        Returns:
        The driver's configuration loader; never null.

      • getLoadBalancingPolicies

        @NonNull
Map<String,LoadBalancingPolicy> getLoadBalancingPolicies()
        Returns:
        The driver's load balancing policies, keyed by profile name; the returned map is guaranteed to never be null and to always contain an entry for the profile.

      • getLoadBalancingPolicy

        @NonNull
default LoadBalancingPolicy getLoadBalancingPolicy(@NonNull
                                                            String profileName)
        Parameters:
        profileName - the profile name; never null.
        Returns:
        The driver's load balancing policy for the given profile; never null.

      • getRetryPolicies

        @NonNull
Map<String,RetryPolicy> getRetryPolicies()
        Returns:
        The driver's retry policies, keyed by profile name; the returned map is guaranteed to never be null and to always contain an entry for the profile.

        @NonNull
Map<String,SpeculativeExecutionPolicy> getSpeculativeExecutionPolicies()
